resources.string: Hind shortcut on the left side of lockscreen
Hind shortcut on the right side of lockscreen
Enable / disable the status bar drop-down function. After disabled, the function of status bar cannot be modified
After hiding the navigation bar, swipe up the bottom of the screen to call up the navigation bar.
Enable/disable the virtual keys under the touch screen.Click is not effective.
Screen the virtual key on the left side of the touch screen. Click is not effective.
Screen the virtual key in the middle of the touch screen. Click is not effective.
Screen the virtual key on the right side of the touch screen. Click is not effective.
Screen lock button, screen lock is not locked when pressing lock screen key.
Enable/Disable IME pops up automatically for data entry by the user
Disable input method with solid digital keyboard device
A suspension button is displayed on the screen instead of the scan button.
A suspension button is displayed on the screen instead of the scan button.
You can use screen pinning to keep the current screen in view until you unpin.(Power+Volume up)
Hide the entry button on the lower left corner of the lock screen to prevent the lock screen from entering the device function.
Hide the entry button on the lower right corner of the lock screen to prevent the lock screen from entering the device function.
Modify the broadcast action sent by the PTT button to realize the custom send broadcast.
Modify the default Launcher of the system and boot to complete the selected desktop.
Enable/Disable IME for data entry by the user
Except the "power" button, set any other button, once being pressed, to activate screen.
Set key trigger to scan RFID or scan
After enabling, all calls are automatically recorded and saved local sdcard/EnterpriseDesktop/record
Note: if the maximum capacity is exceeded, the system will automatically delete the contents between them. Please pay attention to timely backup
A suspension button is displayed on the screen to turn the soft keyboard on or off
